name: nativescript-google-drive
description: A Google Drive client for NativeScript (Android)

scripts.typedoc: rmdir /s /q docs && typedoc --tsconfig tsconfig.json --out .\docs --mode file --excludePrivate --hideGenerator --excludeNotExported --name "NativeScript Google Drive Client (Android only)"
scripts.typedoc:mac: rm -rf docs && typedoc src --tsconfig tsconfig.json --out ./docs --mode file --excludePrivate --hideGenerator --excludeNotExported --name "NativeScript Google Drive Client (Android only)"

author: Radu Nicoara
